dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement!
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Morris, Lashonda [mailto:Lashonda.Morris@pearsoned.com] 
Posted At: Monday, May 15, 2006 3:11 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Copyright Infringement!
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement!


 <<...OLE_Obj...>> 

LaShonda Morris
Web Security Specialist
Pearson Education, Inc.                                                        
One Lake Street                                                                
Upper Saddle River, NJ  07458
Tel:   (201) 236-5803
Fax:  (201) 236-3400
Lashonda_Morris@pearsoned.com <mailto:Lashonda_Morris@pearsoned.com> 
          
May 15, 2006

George Poletes
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Ste. 110
Dallas, TX  75207
e-mail: copyright@theplanet.com
 
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL
 
Dear Sir:
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named Pearson Education, Inc. ("IP
Owner").  I have a good faith belief that the listings identified in the
addendum attached hereto, offer items or contain materials that are not
authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law, and therefore
infringe the IP Owner's
rights according to state, federal, or United States law.   

Please act expeditiously to remove the listings identified in the
addendum.

I may be contacted at:
 
I may be contacted at:
Printed Name:               LaShonda Morris
Title & Company:           Pearson Education, Inc.
Street Address:              One Lake Street
City and State and Zip:   Upper Saddle River, NJ 07458
Email (correspondence):            Lashonda.Morris@pearsoned.com 
Email (ended auction inquiries)*:  Lashonda.Morris@pearsoned.com 
Telephone:                    201-236-5803
Fax:                        201-236-3400


ADDENDUM TO NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT

A.        Infringer: http://www.unix.org.ua <http://www.unix.org.ua>          
IP Address: 67.18.38.24
Yuriy Oleksandrovych Mykhaylov
bulv. Verkhovnoyi Rady, 18, kv. 113
Kyiv  02100
Ukraine
Email: mik@mik.net.ua 

B.        Site reproduces and distributes unauthorized digital copies of
approximately 3 Pearson works, examples of which are specified below:

C.        Infringing Materials:
Cisco CCNA Exam #640-507 Certification Guide, 1/e by Wendy Odom
ISBN: 0-7357-0971-8
Link to material: http://www.unix.org.ua/cisco/CCNA/CiscoPress/
<http://www.unix.org.ua/cisco/CCNA/CiscoPress/> 

CCNP Remote Access Exam Certification Guide, 1/e by Craig Dennis and
Brian Morgan
ISBN: 1-58720-003-1
Link to material:
http://www.unix.org.ua/cisco/CCNP-CCDP/RemoteAccess-CP2001/
<http://www.unix.org.ua/cisco/CCNP-CCDP/RemoteAccess-CP2001/>  

Cisco CID Exam Certification Guide, 1/e by Mike Crane and Reggie Terrell
ISBN: 1-58720-033-3
Link to material: http://www.unix.org.ua/cisco/CCNP-CCDP/CID-CP2001/
<http://www.unix.org.ua/cisco/CCNP-CCDP/CID-CP2001/>         

Truthfully,
LaShonda Morris

***********************************************************************

please notify the sender and delete all copies.

***********************************************************************
